Whether you're trying to get into the Halloween spirit or give your friends a fun scare, the Spooky Mode extension is for you! üéÉ üéÉ 

This extension changes all the images on your screen and plays a Halloween-themed sound whenever you click on Google or YouTube websites. Click the pumpkin icon in your extension menu to toggle Spooky Mode on or off. Dare to activate Spooky Mode this Halloween season! üé∂ üï∑Ô∏è
